1011000100100010 0010010101010110 1 -> sum: 1101011001111001, cout: 0
0100100000001101 0110000100100000 0 -> sum: 1010100100101101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
